segments.text: Do you think I could use your car tomorrow ? I ’ Ve got a date with this girl , see ? And ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Well , now you can have it as long as you bring it back by nine thirty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nine thirty ? That ’ s no good . Couldn ’ t I have it a bit longer ? Even if I fill up the tank ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid not , Nick . That ’ s the best I can do .
segments.speaker: S2
